vectors
Class Ray

java.lang.Object
  vectors.Ray
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRay
public class Ray
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRay

This class represents a ray in 3D. A ray is represented by the following equation: P = p0 + t*V.

Field Summary
private  IPoint3D p0
           
private  IVector3D v

Method Summary
 IPoint3D getP0()
          Returns the starting point of the ray.
 IPoint3D getPointOnRay(double t)
          Returns a point on the ray which is calculated by the following equation: P = p0 + t*V.
 IVector3D getV()
          Returns the direction vector of the ray.
 java.lang.String toString()
          Returns the String representation of the ray.
